translations.text: Wazkur fil Kitaabi idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa

translations.text: Wa-rafa'naahu makaanan aliyyaa

translations.text: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min zurriyyati Aadama Wa-mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw Wa-min zurriyyati ibraaheema Wa-israaa'eela Wa-mimman hadainaa wajta-bainaaa; izaa tutlaa alaihim Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw Wa-bukiyyaa

words.en: Then succeeded||after them||after them||successors||who neglected||the prayer||and they followed||the lusts||so soon||they will meet||evil

translations.text: Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyyaa

words.id: kecuali||orang||ia bertaubat||dan ia beriman||dan ia berbuat/beramal||kebajikan/saleh||maka mereka itu||mereka masuk||surga||dan tidak||mereka dianiaya||sesuatu/sedikitpun

translations.text: illaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal jannata Wa-laa yuzlamoona shai'aa

translations.text: Jannaati adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa

translations.text: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; Wa-lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa

translations.text: Tilkal jannatul latee noorisu min ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa

translations.text: Wa-maa natanazzalu illaa bi-amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa Wa-maa khalfanaa Wa-maa baina zaalik; Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa

words.en: Lord||(of) the heavens||and the earth||and whatever||(is) between both of them||so worship Him||and be constant||in His worship||Do||you know||for Him||any similarity

translations.text: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa fa'bud-hu wastabir li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa

words.id: dan akan berkata||manusia||apakah apabila||apa||telah mati||sungguh akan||aku dikeluarkan||hidup

translations.text: Wa-yaqoolul insaanu a-izaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa

words.en: Does not||remember||[the] man||that We||We created him||before||before||while not||he was||anything

translations.text: 'A-Wa-laa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu Wa-lam yaku shai'aa

translations.text: Wa-izaa tutlaa alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw Wa-ahsanu nadiyyaa

words.en: And how many||We destroyed||before them||of||a generation||they||(were) better||(in) possessions||and appearance

translations.text: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw Wa-ri'yaa

translations.text: Qul man kaana fid da-laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba Wa-immas Saa'ata fasa-ya'lamoona man huwa sharrum makaananw Wa-ad'afu jundaa

words.en: And Allah increases||And Allah increases||those who||accept guidance||(in) guidance||And the everlasting||good deeds||(are) better||near||your Lord||(for) reward||and better||(for) return

translations.text: Wa-yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairum maraddaa

translations.text: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum izzaa

translations.text: Kallaa; sa-yakfuroona bi'ibaadatihim Wa-yakoonoona alaihim diddaa

translations.text: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa

words.en: And We will drive||the criminals||to||Hell||thirsty

translations.text: Wa-nasooqul mujrimeena ilaa Jahannama wirdaa
